snippet: Heat forward Chris Bosh was in Miami early Thursday for his son Jackson’s birth, and in the starting lineup later in New York against the Knicks.
abstract: Miami Heat forward Chris Bosh returns to New York less than an hour before the start of Game 3 of playoff series against New York Knicks after witnessing his wife give birth to their son in Miami.
lead_paragraph: Heat forward Chris Bosh was in Miami early Thursday for his son Jackson’s birth, and in the starting lineup later in New York against the Knicks.

headline.seo: Heat’s Chris Bosh, a New Dad, in Lineup Against Knicks in Game 3
headline.main: A Son in the Morning and a Game at Night
headline.print_headline: For the Heat’s Bosh, It’s a Son in the Morning and a Game at Night
